claim(address,address,uint256,address,ui.details: Claim the shitcoin whose borrow of USDC was not repaid by borrowercan be called after expiry, although can receive the accrued penalty interest if so desired.

create(address,uint256,address,uint256,u.details: Create a Loan that borrows baseToken as a borrower putting a shitcoin as collateral

fill(address,address,uint256,address,uin.details: Fill a loan as a lender putting up USDC for a shitcoin

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct Pool.Loan memory[] memory)

documentation.text: @dev Create a Loan that borrows baseToken as a borrower putting a shitcoin as collateral
@dev Fill a loan as a lender putting up USDC for a shitcoin

@dev Claim the shitcoin whose borrow of USDC was not repaid by borrower
 @dev can be called after expiry, although can receive the accrued penalty interest if so desired.
